nl.renarj.jasdb.core.storage

Interface RecordWriterFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BTreeRecordWriterFactory, TransactionalRecordWriterFactory

    public interface RecordWriterFactory
    This factory is responsible for creating the record storage writer and opening for persistence
    Author:
    Renze de Vries

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecordWriter createWriter(File file)
      Creates a record writer for the given file location
      String providerName()
      Provides the provides name for this factory

        Provides the provides name for this factory

      • createWriter

        RecordWriter createWriter(File file)
                          throws JasDBStorageException
        Creates a record writer for the given file location
        Parameters:
        file - The file on which to create a record writer
        Returns:
        The record writer
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to create a record writer
